Articles.Content: Hi, there is such a problem that I put the mode (PRVE 64k) in KSP and there are two launch sites missing, only one close to the sea, how to get back two launch sites? do you already need an upgrade (PRVE 64k)?
I am unfamiliar with this mod but I have moved your post to the support sub where someone else might be. Good luck.

PRVE is for RSS I think, not stock Kerbin. However it’s only a visual mod and won’t affect launch sites.

Check that you have ‘allow other launch sites’ enabled in the difficulty settings (escape key > settings > difficulty settings) for this save, it gets set differently for each save game.
